<wsdl:definitions name="WarehouseExternalService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse/doc"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="event" type="tns:event"/> <xs:element name="execute" type="tns:execute"/> <xs:element name="executeResponse" type="tns:executeResponse"/> <xs:element name="product" type="tns:product"/> <xs:complexType name="execute"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="job" type="tns:externalInput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="externalInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="hour" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="min" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="content" type="tns:product"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:kindofTransaction"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="depth" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="height" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="width" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="executeResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="processed" type="tns:externalOutput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="externalOutput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="event_out" type="tns:event"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="event"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="action" type="tns:kindAction"/> <xs:element name="consulted" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="done" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="hour" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="min" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="content" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="kindofTransaction"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PICK"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERY"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="kindAction"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PICKUP"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERY"/> <xs:enumeration value="UNKNOWN"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse/doc" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/warehouse/doc"> <xsd:element name="UnknownOperation" type="tns:UnknownOperation"/> <xsd:complexType name="UnknownOperation"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ArgumentException"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:UnknownOperation" name="ArgumentException"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="executeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:executeResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="execute"> <wsdl:part element="tns:execute" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ExternalDoc"> <wsdl:operation name="execute"> <wsdl:input message="tns:execute" name="execute"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:executeResponse" name="executeResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:ArgumentException" name="ArgumentException"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="WarehouseExternalServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:ExternalDoc"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="execute"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="execute"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="executeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ArgumentException"> <soap:fault name="ArgumentException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="WarehouseExternalService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:WarehouseExternalServiceSoapBinding" name="WarehouseExternalPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservices/WarehouseExternalDOC"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
